title: Slime Conquer: Epic Battles
description: Slime Conquer: Epic Battle is a casual arcade game where you play as a slime blob who must defeat humankind and conquer the island. Control the blob through the endless enemies and become the conqueror! You will start small at first and will grow big as you progress. Be as big as possible to defeat the boss. Hunt all the creatures that are smaller than you and grow bigger to defeat the enemies. Overcome all the obstacles and win the battle with the boss at the end of the round!
